attributes.action: Introduce National Service for all 18-24 year olds male and female
attributes.additional_details: The youth of many generations has been lost because of lack of respect and discipline starting in our education system and it’s time youth started learning respect for the counties that they live in, this national service will apply to all four countries of the UK and will be mandatory
attributes.background: 2 year full service inc  military jail time for those who refuse - full vetting and this to include any person who has chosen to come live in the UK, refusal will mean deportation and no right of entry ever again
